title: Young Boy in Formal Attire Sitting Indoors
description: A young boy is sitting indoors, dressed in a brown checkered blazer, a white shirt with a small pattern, and a red bow tie. He is seated on an ornate, white chair at a glass-topped table. In the background, there are light pink curtains, a decorative lamp with a frilly shade, flowers, and a patterned cup and saucer on the table.
